rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area that incorporates local materials and Vastu-aligned design with a reception counter.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan space combining living, dining and kitchen areas. The layout encourages natural light and ventilation in accordance with Chettinad style. It includes an integrated modern kitchen design with a central island for casual entertaining.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A quiet, dedicated workspace located near the living area but separated by sliding partitions to ensure minimal distractions. The room features soundproofing and proper lighting per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with attached bathroom, ensuring privacy and tranquility. The design incorporates local stone finishes and traditional motifs.

openings.description: Large glass door that allows natural light to enter the lobby area, aligning with Vastu principles.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on the southern wall to maximize sunlight and enhance energy flow.
Sliding door that offers flexibility between open and private working spaces.
Separate entry for the two-car garage ensuring smooth traffic flow and adherence to local building codes.
